answer:
Individuals born before 1970 are generally assumed to have acquired immunity to measles from natural infection, and therefore MMR vaccine is not recommended for these individuals. If you had measles disease in childhood you are immune to measles and do not need to get the vaccine. BC first offered a measles vaccine in 1969.
Immunization Nurse

Immunization Nurse
